helpText: Ă_Edit, delete, or reorder categories in your organization______________________________ș.

generic.title: Ă_Error updating categories__________________________ș
generic.message: Ă_Something went wrong. Please try again later________________________ș.

maxDepthExceeded.title: Ă_Error updating categories__________________________ș
maxDepthExceeded.message: Ă_You cannot nest categories more than 2 levels deep___________________________ș.

destinationHasSameName.title: Ă_Error updating categories__________________________ș
destinationHasSameName.message: Ă_A category with the same name already exists in the destination category______________________________________ș.

noSchema.title: Ă_Schema not found_________________ș
noSchema.message: Ă_Item schema not found for user_________________ș.

maxCharacter.title: Ă_Error updating categories__________________________ș
maxCharacter.message: Ă_Category names can be a maximum of ${maxCharacter} characters long___________________________________ș.

deleteInUseCategory.title: Ă_Delete category________________ș
deleteInUseCategory.message: Ă_${numItem} items are assigned to this category. Deleting the category will also remove it from these items_______________________________________________________ș.

custom.title: Ă_Custom categories__________________ș
custom.message: Ă_Create your own categories to organize content within your organization_____________________________________ș.

arcgis.title: Ă_ArcGIS categories__________________ș
arcgis.message: Ă_ArcGIS categories include a selection of topic categories and subcategories that can be used to categorize many types of geospatial content. These categories are used to support ArcGIS Living Atlas of the World___________________________________________________________________________________________________________ș.

iso.title: Ă_ISO categories_______________ș
iso.message: Ă_ISO categories includes topic categories from the International Organization for Standardization that provide a method for describing and cataloging geographic information_______________________________________________________________________________________ș.

inspire.title: Ă_INSPIRE categories___________________ș
inspire.message: Ă_INSPIRE categories include a comprehensive set of spatial data themes set out in the INSPIRE Directive_____________________________________________________ș.
